summary: In Manhattan, film-maker Erik bonds with closeted lawyer Paul after a fling. As their relationship becomes one fueled by highs, lows, and dysfunctional patterns, Erik struggles to negotiate his own boundaries while being true to himself.

keywords: gay love|interracial relationship|male prostitute|gay hustler|closeted homosexual
title: Keep the Lights On
